```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(MRAinla)
data("MODISdataTraining")
data("MODISdataTest")

fittedModel <- MRA_INLA(
  responseVec = MODISdataTraining@data$y,
  covariateFrame = subset(MODISdataTraining@data, select = -y),
  spatialCoordMat = MODISdataTraining@sp@coords,
  timePOSIXctVec = time(MODISdataTraining),
  predCovariateFrame = MODISdataTest@data,
  predSpatialCoordMat = MODISdataTest@sp@coords,
  predTimePOSIXctVec = time(MODISdataTest),
  sinusoidalProjection = FALSE,
  spatialRangeList = NULL, 
  timeRangeList = NULL, 
  FEmuVec = rep(0, ncol(MODISdataTraining@data)),
  control = list(
    Mlon = 1,
    Mlat = 1,
    Mtime = 1
  )
  )
```
